message: I actually used to use TextMate's menu of new from template for some things like HTML pages and shell scripts
tSkeleton looks OK, but I'd love to also find some good starter files to go with it
I have snipmate, but those are just inner snippets, though I guess I could make a snippet for a whole skeleton
I use templates.vim for simple templates: http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1172
